contents: One of the hardest thing to discern as a new security student was the different terms in security. On one hand we have cybersecurity and on the other, we have information security.
title: Security vs Cybersecurity

contents:
A Quick HistoryLink to headingI have started college at the University of Alabama at Birmingham where I first studied English for about two years then I have started my Computer Science curriculum after obtaining a sufficient score in the International English Language Testing System (IELTS) exam. After this experience, I came back to Côte d’Ivoire where I obtained a Bachelor’s degree at the International University of Grand-Bassam in Computer Science.
Work HistoryLink to heading2021 - 2022 Maillot.Pro - Software Engineer | Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire
2020 - 2021 Wirepick - Software Engineer | Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire
2016 - 2017 KnownHost - Technical Support Operator | Birmingham, Alabama, USA
2015 - 2016 ProctorU - Exam Integrity & Investigation Specialist | Birmingham, Alabama, USA
2014 - 2015 UAB’s 1917 Clinic - Technical Support Agent | Birmingham, Alabama, USA
DownloadLink to headingYou can click this link to download my CV in English.
You can click this link to download my CV in French.
Current ActivitiesLink to headingI am currently doing a Master’s Degree in Security - CyberSecurity and Artificial Intelligence at the Institut National Polytechnique Houphouet Boigny (INPHB) in the International Data Science Institute. The program was co-founded by three schools that is the École Polytechnique (l’X), Ecole Nationale Supérieure de Statistique et d’Economie Appliquée (ENSEA) et Institut National Polytechnique Houphouet Boigny (INPHB)
title: About
